text: Bring It On! is the 52nd studio album by American musician James Brown. The album belongs to Funk/Soul genre and was released in 1983, by Churchill/ Augusta Sound in US.It was released in a LP format as a Vinyl album. The songs were recorded with Jimmy Nola, Arthur Dickson, and J.B,'s Internationals. == Credits == The album's Producer is James Brown, Art Director is Sherman Brooks, and Photographer was done by Gina Halsey. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1983 albums Category:James Brown albums Category:Albums produced by James Brown
title: Bring It On! (James Brown album)
